title: Textile, 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound plain weave with supplemental warps
description: Fragment of linen fabric. White ground striped plain cloth and satin. Over plain cloth stripes are extra warps of yellow forming a small-scale, zigzag, conventionalized flower design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: silk
Technique: compound plain weave with supplemental warps. Gift of Mrs. Montgomery Hare. 1936-29-5.
